name: The Routine (farhad_k100)
description:
Downloading the Windows version is highly recommended!!! (Better graphics and fps)

Can you survive The Routine?

Movement: W A S D

Interact: E

(IDEALLY) READ AFTER YOU PLAY THE GAME!!

The Routine is a Psychological Horror game that is meant to reflect the everyday life of a corporate employee. Everything in the game has a meaning, but it's free for interpretation. Do you think you can get the meaning behind the game? And when you do, do you think you can survive your Routine?!
